quiz.title: Find Your Skin Type
quiz.description: Answer these questions to discover your skin type

questions.question: How does your skin usually feel a few hours after cleansing, without applying any products?

options.text: Very shiny, especially on the forehead and nose
Shiny in some areas and dry in others

questions.question: How often does your skin feel oily throughout the day?

options.text: It depends on products, but irritation is more noticeable

questions.question: How does your skin usually react to new skincare products?

options.text: It sometimes feels dry or tight
It often becomes red, itchy, or irritated

questions.question: How visible are your pores, especially around the nose and cheeks?

options.text: Not very visible, but skin feels reactive

questions.question: How does your skin feel at the end of the day?

options.text: Oily in some areas, dry in others

questions.question: How does your skin usually behave in cold or dry weather?

options.text: Dry in some areas, oily in others

questions.question: Which statement best describes your skin overall?

options.text: Prone to excess oil and breakouts
Often feels dry and needs rich products
Difficult to balance due to mixed areas
Reacts easily and needs gentle care

oily.title: Oily Skin
oily.message: Your skin produces more natural oil (sebum), which can cause shine, enlarged pores, and a higher chance of breakouts. Focus on oil-control products and lightweight, non-comedogenic moisturizers.

dry.title: Dry Skin
dry.message: Your skin lacks sufficient moisture and may feel tight, rough, or flaky. Look for rich moisturizers and gentle, hydrating cleansers.

combination.title: Combination Skin
combination.message: Your skin has both oily and dry areas, typically with oiliness in the T-zone. Consider using different products for different zones.

sensitive.title: Sensitive Skin
sensitive.message: Your skin reacts easily to products or environmental factors. Choose fragrance-free, gentle formulations and patch test new products.

normal.title: Normal Skin
normal.message: Your skin is well-balanced with minimal concerns. Focus on maintaining this healthy state with a consistent routine.
